message: Starting Cluster A personality disorder question generation. Creating 4 questions covering Paranoid, Schizoid, and Schizotypal disorders with application-level scenarios.
Creating Question 1: Application-level scenario distinguishing Paranoid vs Schizoid personality disorders based on motivation for social isolation

COMPLETED: Generated 4 high-quality Cluster A personality disorder questions in proper JSON format. Questions include: (1) Schizoid case distinguishing indifference from fear/suspicion, (2) Paranoid case showing distrust and grudge-keeping, (3) Schizotypal case with ideas of reference and odd appearance, (4) Tricky comparative question on social functioning distinctions. All questions include comprehensive explanations with differential diagnosis rationale. Output formatted as valid JSON array matching project requirements.
